marklogic.body: I see the wolf and a cane on scan with the same names. Wolf is warping belt to belt and cane is on or near a station. Obvious bait is obvious. I land 100km the wolf and mwd around a bit, my normal overview has keep at 1000km, standard is 1000m ... I click keep at range and start Burning into scram range without even locking him. Thankfully I Resolve lock as he overshoots me and web goes on at 7km, range is kept and a few volleys puts him down, I then start messing with the overview buttons and the cane lands at 15km ... forgot about that one. I put range easily and warp to station. pop the wreck as I run away, no loot for anyone if I cant have it.
